Functions for managing Inter-Processor Communication (IPC) Mailbox. More...

Detailed Description

Functions for managing Inter-Processor Communication (IPC) Mailbox.

#include <stdint.h>
#include <stdbool.h>
#include "am_mcu_apollo.h"
